name: Python HPC Tutorials
body:
### Learn Python for High Performace Computing.
This is a series of lectures and examples for using python for scientific computing on a high performance cluster.  During the school year, we give these lectures at the Univeristy of Colorado.  Please follow us on [Meetup](http://www.meetup.com/University-of-Colorado-Computational-Science-and-Engineering/) to stay connected and learn more.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
